Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: E4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 09:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: October 24, 2012

The Work Experience is a comedy series that features sitcom, mock documentary and prank show formats to create an original and hilarious series. The series is set in the fashion PR agency Grade PR and each week two ambitious interns embark on a week of tasks, tantrums and tears. However, unknown to them, the entire agency is fictional and the employees are a mixture of talented actors.


(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33247)
